min_period_number.label: Minimum Period Number
min_period_number.tooltip: Minimum rental period global setting. Like 2 Days means person can't rent less than 2 days. Only applies if product is set to use global setting

min_period_type.label: Minimum Period Type
min_period_type.tooltip: Minimum rental period global setting. Like 2 Days means person can't rent less than 2 days. Only applies if product is set to use global setting

use_minimum_rental_period.label: Use minimum rental period if no rental dates are selected by customer

max_period_number.label: Maximum period Number
max_period_number.tooltip: Maximum rental period global setting. 5 Days would mean maximum rental period is 5 days. Only applies if product is set to use global setting

max_period_type.label: Maximum period Type
max_period_type.tooltip: Maximum rental period global setting. 5 Days would mean maximum rental period is 5 days. Only applies if product is set to use global setting

show_min_max_details_page.label: Show minimum and maximum rental period on product details page

min_qty_allowed.label: Minimum Quantity Allowed in Shopping Cart
min_qty_allowed.tooltip: Minimum Quantity Allowed in Shopping Cart

max_qty_allowed.label: Maximum Quantity Allowed in Shopping Cart
max_qty_allowed.tooltip: Maximum Quantity Allowed in Shopping Cart

turnover_before_number.label: Turnover Before Number
turnover_before_number.tooltip: How long before a rental is started is the inventory not available for. This is to account for cleaning, shipping, etc. For example if rental starts on May 15 and this is set to 2 days, then the inventory will not be available for May 13 and 14

turnover_before_type.label: Turnover Before Type
turnover_before_type.tooltip: How long before a rental is started is the inventory not available for. This is to account for cleaning, shipping, etc. For example if rental starts on May 15 and this is set to 2 days, then the inventory will not be available for May 13 and 14

turnover_after_number.label: Turnover After Number
turnover_after_number.tooltip: How long after a rental is returned is it not available for. This is to account for cleaning, shipping, etc. For example if the rental ends on June 1 and turnover after is set to 2 days, then the inventory will not be available on June 2 and 3

turnover_after_type.label: Turnover After Type
turnover_after_type.tooltip: How long after a rental is returned is it not available for. This is to account for cleaning, shipping, etc. For example if the rental ends on June 1 and turnover after is set to 2 days, then the inventory will not be available on June 2 and 3

exclude_disabled_from_turnover.label: Exclude disabled days of week from being counted as turnover days
exclude_disabled_from_turnover.tooltip: Exclude disabled days of week from being counted as turnover days

reserve_inventory_noinvoice.label: Reserve inventory without any invoice
reserve_inventory_noinvoice.tooltip: Usually Magento will not reserve inventory unless an order is invoiced. If you want inventory to be automatically reserved as soon as an order is placed, set to yes

use_reserveby_status.label: Reserve inventory by status
use_reserveby_status.tooltip: If you only want inventory reserved for certain order statuses, set to yes

reserved_statuses.label: Reserve these statuses
reserved_statuses.tooltip: Control + Click the statuses you want to have mean that inventory reserved. Is only active if the “Reserve inventory by status” setting is set to yes

use_reserve_inventory_send_return.label: Override rental end date with actual return date if set
use_reserve_inventory_send_return.tooltip: Override rental end date with actual return date if set

use_reserve_inventory_dropoff_pickup.label: Override rental start/end date with dropoff/pickup dates if set
use_reserve_inventory_dropoff_pickup.tooltip: Override rental start/end date with dropoff/pickup dates if set

hide_booked_inventory_grid.label: Hide Available/Booked inventory in product grid
hide_booked_inventory_grid.tooltip: If you want to hide available/booked inventory in admin product grid, set to yes

addtime_number.label: Add to price calculation Number
addtime_number.tooltip: Say you want a 1 day rental to give a 2 day price. If you set here 1 day then it would add this number to the calculation and do what you want

addtime_type.label: Add to price calculation Type
addtime_type.tooltip: Say you want a 1 day rental to give a 2 day price. If you set here 1 day then it would add this number to the calculation and do what you want

use_sso.label: Use SSO
use_sso.tooltip: Only used for SSO systems, not common

sso_rent_link.label: Rent Link Webservice
sso_rent_link.tooltip: Leave blank, goes with SSO not commonly used

enable_extend.label: Allow extend Order
enable_extend.tooltip: Enabled customer and admin to extend orders

max_extension_period_number.label: Maximum extension period number
max_extension_period_number.tooltip: Number of days the order is allowed to be extnded over initial start date. If 1 month is selected, then the order can be extended for maximum 1 month starting with the initial start date.

max_extension_period_type.label: Maximum extension Period Type
max_extension_period_type.tooltip: Number of days the order is allowed to be extnded over initial start date. If 1 month is selected, then the order can be extended for maximum 1 month starting with the initial start date.

category_membership.label: Category ID To Show For Memberships
category_membership.tooltip: This is described under quick setup step 1. This is to set the category id of your rental memberships category. If you are not offering rental memberships leave blank

show_rental_link.label: Show Rental Queue Link on Top Menu and Customer Account Menu
show_rental_link.tooltip: This is to turn on or off the rental queue menu link. If you are not offering rental memberships, you can set this to no

includeproduct.label: Include product name on pdf labels

addressfirst.label: Print address before product name on pdf labels

show_price.label: Number of prices points to show on product page
show_price.tooltip:
How many prices show on the product listing only applies to reservation type products that use rental pricing. For example if you set to 2, then the first 2 price period would show like:
1 day $5
1 week $10
If you set to 3, then it would show 3 of the price periods.

prices_on_listing.label: Number of prices points to show on listing
prices_on_listing.tooltip:
How many prices show on the product listing only applies to reservation type products that use rental pricing. For example if you set to 2, then the first 2 price period would show like:
1 day $5
1 week $10
If you set to 3, then it would show 3 of the price periods.

nr_calendars.label: Calendars to Show on Product Page
nr_calendars.tooltip: How many calendars popup when a person mouses in to the start and end time input fields

fixed_selection.label: Use Fixed Dates Selection
fixed_selection.tooltip: Put here data if you don't want people to use calendar selection, rather a fixed dates selection. For example if you put here 7,14,21 that would mean you only allow 7 day, 14 day, and 21 day rentals. Important: You need To Enable Also Override Autoselect End Date.

add_start_date.label: Fixed Dates Selection - Start Date is counted as 1 day
add_start_date.tooltip: For example March 21-24 is considered 4 days instead of 3. Only applies to fixed dates selection.

no_calendar_use_today_with_fixed_selecti.label: No Calendar. Use Today as Start Date. End Date will be a fixed selection
no_calendar_use_today_with_fixed_selecti.tooltip: Select Yes to not show any calendar and use today as start date and end date any of the fixed selection

hour_next_day.label: Hour For Next Day
hour_next_day.tooltip:
Time of day that your store closes and you no longer accept rentals for today. So if you set this to 3pm, after 3pm clients can no longer make rentals for today.
Format is HH:MM:SS as in Hour, Minute, and Second in 24 hour time format. 13:15:15 would mean 1:15pm and 15 seconds.

allow_listing_qty.label: Allow change QTY on Listing Page

hide_time_periods_numbers.label: Hide time period numbers from product info page

show_buyout_price.label: Show buyout price on listing page

keep_listing_price_after_selection.label: Show price listing on product listing pages even after dates are selected

show_next_available_date_listing.label: Show next available date on listing

show_next_available_date_view.label: Show next available date on product view

hide_end_date_product.label: Hide End Date on Product Page

hotel_mode.label: Hotel / Property Rental Mode
hotel_mode.tooltip: Enabling this means that you accept reservations for the same start/end day. This is because hotel/property rentals allow one person to checkout and another person to checkin on the same day. This is different than rental products that don't allow overlaps

store_open_time.label: Store Open Time
store_open_time.tooltip: What time your store opens. This is used for the time of day drop down for rental start time if enabled

store_close_time.label: Store Close Time
store_close_time.tooltip: What time your store closes. This is used for the time of day drop down for the rental end time if enabled

store_open_time_monday.label: Store Open Time For Monday
store_open_time_monday.tooltip: What time your store opens on Monday. This is used for the time of day drop down for rental start time if enabled

store_close_time_monday.label: Store Close Time Monday
store_close_time_monday.tooltip: What time your store closes. This is used for the time of day drop down for the rental end time if enabled

store_open_time_tuesday.label: Store Open Time For Tuesday
store_open_time_tuesday.tooltip: What time your store opens on Tuesday. This is used for the time of day drop down for rental start time if enabled

store_close_time_tuesday.label: Store Close Time Tuesday
store_close_time_tuesday.tooltip: What time your store closes. This is used for the time of day drop down for the rental end time if enabled

store_open_time_wednesday.label: Store Open Time For Wednesday
store_open_time_wednesday.tooltip: What time your store opens on Tuesday. This is used for the time of day drop down for rental start time if enabled

store_close_time_wednesday.label: Store Close Time Wednesday
store_close_time_wednesday.tooltip: What time your store closes. This is used for the time of day drop down for the rental end time if enabled

store_open_time_thursday.label: Store Open Time For Thursday
store_open_time_thursday.tooltip: What time your store opens on Tuesday. This is used for the time of day drop down for rental start time if enabled

store_close_time_thursday.label: Store Close Time Thursday
store_close_time_thursday.tooltip: What time your store closes. This is used for the time of day drop down for the rental end time if enabled

store_open_time_friday.label: Store Open Time For Friday
store_open_time_friday.tooltip: What time your store opens on Tuesday. This is used for the time of day drop down for rental start time if enabled

store_close_time_friday.label: Store Close Time Friday
store_close_time_friday.tooltip: What time your store closes. This is used for the time of day drop down for the rental end time if enabled

store_open_time_saturday.label: Store Open Time For Saturday
store_open_time_saturday.tooltip: What time your store opens on Tuesday. This is used for the time of day drop down for rental start time if enabled

store_close_time_saturday.label: Store Close Time Saturday
store_close_time_saturday.tooltip: What time your store closes. This is used for the time of day drop down for the rental end time if enabled

store_open_time_sunday.label: Store Open Time For Sunday
store_open_time_sunday.tooltip: What time your store opens on Tuesday. This is used for the time of day drop down for rental start time if enabled

store_close_time_sunday.label: Store Close Time Sunday
store_close_time_sunday.tooltip: What time your store closes. This is used for the time of day drop down for the rental end time if enabled

disabled_days_week_start.label: Disabled days of week for start date
disabled_days_week_start.tooltip: Days of week when you can't start renting something

disabled_days_week_end.label: Disabled days of week for end date
disabled_days_week_end.tooltip: Days of week when you can't end the rental

disabled_days_week.label: Disabled days of week for both start/end date
disabled_days_week.tooltip: Days of week you can't rent something. These are considered when you want or not count price for disabled days

disabled_days_week_from.label: Exclude disabled days from
disabled_days_week_from.tooltip: Exclude disbled days from price or calendar or both

use_modified_order_creator.label: Use Modified Version Of Order Creator
use_modified_order_creator.tooltip: Set to no, not commonly used

show_start_end_text_on_editor.label: Show Start / End Dates as Text on Order Editor
show_start_end_text_on_editor.tooltip: By default is yes, is useful usually for admins to see this

show_start_end_columns_on_editor.label: Show Start / End Dates as Columns on Order Editor

hide_addresses.label: Do not show addresses on admin
hide_addresses.tooltip: When creating order on admin use a generic customer and hide the addresses. If customer is new it shouldn't work ok

allow_buyout.label: Allow buyout button in order view page

admin_time_dropdown.label: Show time of day drop downs in admin
admin_time_dropdown.tooltip: When disabled time of day drop downs won't show in admin

allow_admin_overbook.label: Allow admin orders to overbook
allow_admin_overbook.tooltip: If set to no, when trying to overbook on an admin order it will auto adjust the quantity to the max available. So if you try to add 2 to an order but have 1, the quantity will be adjusted to 1

show_admin_overbook_warning.label: Show warning on admin orders when adding to order a product not in stock
show_admin_overbook_warning.tooltip: Show warning on admin orders when adding to order a product not in stock

time_increment.label: Time Increment
time_increment.tooltip: The period of time used for the time of day drop down if enabled for a product. If set to 60 minutes it would mean the drop down would show 12am, 1am, 2am, etc. If set to 30 minutes, drop down would have 12am, 12:30am, 1am, etc.

enforce_same_dates.label: All products in order must use same start & end date

use_global_days.label: Keep Selected Days Automatically For Other Products
use_global_days.tooltip: Say a customer rents a product for June 1 - 5. When they go to rent other products it will remember that they had June 1 - 5 and have these dates pre-filled for them. If this is set to no, then each product the customer will have to select the dates start/end

product_calendar_padding_days.label: Padding days
product_calendar_padding_days.tooltip: How many days before today's date are not available. For example if you set 2, and today is July 1, first available date would be July 3

theme_calendar_style.label: Calendar Style
theme_calendar_style.comment: For style previews and info on how to roll your own theme, please visit our Calendar Style documentation.

show_calendar_no_inputs.label: Show calendar by default without inputs

future_limit.label: Future Reservation limit
future_limit.tooltip: How far in advanced a reservation can be made. 0 For no limit. Input is in days: for 1 year would be 365

use_global_calendar_time.label: Show Times On Global Calendar
use_global_calendar_time.tooltip: For future use, leave set to no

show_calendar_product_info.label: Show product calendar when on product page

global_calendar_padding_days.label: Global Calendar Reservation Padding Day's
global_calendar_padding_days.tooltip: If using global calendar, how many days before today's date are not available. For example if you set 2, and today is July 1, first available date would be July 3

use_pprbox_left.label: Show global calendar on left sidebar

use_pprbox_right.label: Show global calendar on right sidebar

use_pprbox_homepage.label: Show global calendar on homepage only

use_pprbox_shopping_cart.label: Show global calendar on Shopping Cart

use_categories_box.label: Show categories under the dates selector

use_pprbox_shopping_cart_time.label: Show global calendar on Shopping Cart with Time

use_list_buttons.label: Use list buttons
use_list_buttons.tooltip: If you put yes, then the product listing will show customer rent buttons for fixed dates selections. Fixed date selections are set under the heading Listing and Info Page > Use Fixed Dates Selection

disable_clicking_rent_if_dates_not_selec.label: Disable clicking rent on product listing if dates are not selected

hide_products_not_available.label: Hide (filter out) products not available for selected dates
hide_products_not_available.tooltip: If you put yes, then the product listing won't show the products not available for the selected dates

show_availability_on_listing.label: Show whether product is available or not for selected dates on product listing pages when global dates are selected
show_availability_on_listing.tooltip: Show whether product is available or not for selected dates on product listing pages when global dates are selected

use_pprbox_style.label: Use RTRW styling on homepage widget
use_pprbox_style.tooltip: This setting is when you enable global calendar on homepage. The styling of the calendar will be exactly like on RTRW. If set to no global calendar will still appear but will use the default styling.

attrib_name.label: Attribute name
attrib_name.tooltip: Atribute name to show in the frontend widget in RTRW style

cat_names.label: Categories names
cat_names.tooltip: Categories to show in the bottom of widget

catid_name.label: Category to go if no attribute
catid_name.tooltip: Category to go if no attribute in the widget

deposit_type.label: Charge Deposit
deposit_type.tooltip: If this is set to enabled deposit is authorized and charged and cannot be refunded. If set to disabled deposit is only authorized and can be captured at a later time

deposit_per_order.label: Global Deposit per Order
deposit_per_order.tooltip: Deposit amount fixed or percent per Order. If percent just add % to the number

global_deposit_per_product.label: Global Deposit per Product
global_deposit_per_product.tooltip: Global Deposit Amount per product fixed or percent per Product. If percent just add % to the number

global_damage_waiver.label: Global Damage Waiver
global_damage_waiver.tooltip: Global damage waiver fixed or percent per product. If percent just add % to the number

force_damage_waiver.label: Force customer to purchase damage waiver.

terms.label: Terms and conditions to include in rental contract

headertext.label: Customer header text to include in contract

footertext.label: Customer footer text to include in contract

items.label: Include list of items in the contract

signature.label: Include manual hard copy signature field
signature.tooltip: This is for if you are printing off manually your rental contract and want your customer to sign it on paper

digitalsignature.label: Show rental contract link and enable digital signatures in my account > my orders area
digitalsignature.tooltip: This will show in the my orders area a link "Rental Contract" that allows customers to download a rental contract and sign it digitally using their mouse or touchscreen

checkoutsignature.label: Require rental contract signature for checkout
checkoutsignature.tooltip: This will show on checkout review a signature field and customer is required to sign to proceed and place the order

attachorder.label: Attach Contract PDF to order emails?

enddate.label: Use end date with turnover or without for admin calendar reports

showserials.label: Show serial numbers column on admin product grid

tobebilled_email.label: Email Template with a list of users to be billed the day

extend_reminder_email.label: Email Template with a list of orders to be extended

reminder_days.label: Number of days before to start sending return reminders

admin_reminder_emails.label: Admin Reminder Emails as comma separated list

use_send_return_auto_email.label: Send automatically emails to Admin users defined in "Admin Reminder Emails" on start of day with products to be sent and returned

use_send_email.label: Send email to user when items are shipped

use_send_queue_email.label: Send queue email to user when items are shipped

use_return_email.label: Send email to user when items are received

use_return_reminder_email.label: Send email to remind user when to return the item

use_tobebilled_members_email.label: Send email with a list of members to be billed every day

use_extend_reminder_email.label: Send email to remind user when to extend the item

extend_reminder_days.label: Number of days before to start sending extend reminders
